xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/67988-Curse of the Wolf 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/m15Hk4N9e0efO8ON2ZUBpu8U8lk.jpg Dakota, a young werewolf, has finally learned to control her nighttime transformations. She desperately wants to live a normal life, and to break free from her curse, she flees to hide in the city. When the pack aggressively hunts her down, the bouncers offer her protection and band together to battle the werewolves who want her dead... and who won't give up their wolf without a vicious fight. Curse of the Wolf
